1418.verse: وَلَوْ|And if|58|66|179$أَنَّ|that|48|65|240$لِكُلِّ|for every|80|97|3746$نَفْسٍ|soul|62|79|2507$ظَلَمَتْ|(that) wronged,|126|143|8189$مَا|whatever|82|99|262$فِى|(is) in|58|75|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the earth,|92|100|100$لَٱفْتَدَتْ|it (would) seek to ransom|190|198|8190$بِهِۦ‌ۗ|with it,|67|83|204$وَأَسَرُّواْ|and they (will) confide|169|185|8191$ٱلنَّدَامَةَ|the regret|87|103|8192$لَمَّا|when|55|71|3471$رَأَوُاْ|they see|78|86|8193$ٱلْعَذَابَ‌ۖ|the punishment.|127|137|1442$وَقُضِىَ|But will be judged|137|157|8194$بَيْنَهُم|between them|115|135|1056$بِٱلْقِسْطِ‌ۚ|in justice,|86|106|2700$وَهُمْ|and they|79|99|256$لَا|(will) not|79|89|30$يُظْلَمُونَ|(be) wronged.|114|114|2730$

1420.verse: هُوَ|He|48|68|298$يُحْىِۦ|gives life|78|118|2306$وَيُمِيتُ|and causes death,|143|183|2307$وَإِلَيْهِ|and to Him|91|131|2165$تُرْجَعُونَ|you will be returned.|156|176|297$

1421.verse: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ|O mankind!|131|147|188$قَدْ|Verily|56|88|1097$جَآءَتْكُم|has come to you|131|163|6536$مَّوْعِظَةٌ|an instruction|111|143|2480$مِّن|from|50|82|53$رَّبِّكُمْ|your Lord,|87|103|490$وَشِفَآءٌ|and a healing|108|126|8196$لِّمَا|for what|76|111|426$فِى|(is) in|58|93|89$ٱلصُّدُورِ|your breasts,|108|143|3216$وَهُدًى|and guidance|108|143|921$وَرَحْمَةٌ|and mercy|92|110|1376$لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ|for the believers.|133|133|923$

1422.verse: قُلْ|Say,|50|61|765$بِفَضْلِ ٱللَّهِ|"In the Bounty of Allah|170|192|8197$وَبِرَحْمَتِهِۦ|and in His Mercy|129|151|8198$فَبِذَٲلِكَ|so in that|84|106|8199$فَلْيَفْرَحُواْ|let them rejoice."|134|156|8200$هُوَ|It|48|59|298$خَيْرٌ|(is) better|88|179|520$مِّمَّا|than what|88|270|216$يَجْمَعُونَ|they accumulate.|136|227|3433$

1424.verse: وَمَا|And what|83|96|46$ظَنُّ|(will be the) assumption|179|205|8208$ٱلَّذِينَ|(of) those who|119|145|20$يَفْتَرُونَ|invent|91|117|2726$عَلَى|against|68|94|52$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|66|606$ٱلْكَذِبَ|the lie|84|91|3020$يَوْمَ|(on) the Day|105|119|1057$ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ‌ۗ|(of) the Judgment?|147|161|820$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|84|58$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|67|184$لَذُو فَضْلٍ|(is) surely Full (of) Bounty|194|201|2154$عَلَى|to|63|77|52$ٱلنَّاسِ|the mankind,|105|132|75$وَلَـٰكِنَّ|but|78|105|952$أَكْثَرَهُمْ|most of them|108|135|5560$لَا|(are) not|80|107|30$يَشْكُرُونَ|grateful.|105|119|6484$

1418.verse: And if each soul that wronged had everything on earth, it would offer it in ransom. And they will confide regret when they see the punishment; and they will be judged in justice, and they will not be wronged

1419.verse: Unquestionably, to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth. Unquestionably, the promise of Allah is truth, but most of them do not know

1420.verse: He gives life and causes death, and to Him you will be returned

1421.verse: O mankind, there has to come to you instruction from your Lord and healing for what is in the breasts and guidance and mercy for the believers.

1422.verse: Say, "In the bounty of Allah and in His mercy - in that let them rejoice; it is better than what they accumulate."

1423.verse: Say, "Have you seen what Allah has sent down to you of provision of which you have made [some] lawful and [some] unlawful?" Say, "Has Allah permitted you [to do so], or do you invent [something] about Allah?"

1424.verse: And what will be the supposition of those who invent falsehood about Allah on the Day of Resurrection? Indeed, Allah is full of bounty to the people, but most of them are not grateful."

1425.verse: And, [O Muhammad], you are not [engaged] in any matter or recite any of the Qur'an and you [people] do not do any deed except that We are witness over you when you are involved in it. And not absent from your Lord is any [part] of an atom's weight within the earth or within the heaven or [anything] smaller than that or greater but that it is in a clear register.
